# Epic 3: Senior Supervision Inspection System

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-18](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-18/epic-3-senior-supervision-inspection-system)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog
**Labels:** Feature

## Description

Create a supervision inspection tracking system based on פיקוחים עליונים - כמות בדיקות.xlsx.

**Goal:** Track required inspections per consultant type at various construction stages.

**Key Requirements:**

1. Consultant/Supervisor type definitions
2. Inspection stages per consultant
3. Inspection tracking (scheduled, completed, approved)
4. Flexible stage definitions (JSONB for dynamic stages)
5. Link to construction areas/progress

**Data from Excel:** 21 consultant types with 1-7 inspection stages each including:

* Agronomist, Soil, Hydrologist, Waterproofing, Structural Engineer
* Architect, Electrical, Plumbing, HVAC, Safety
* Accessibility, Traffic, Lighting, Signage, Radiation
* Aluminum, Acoustics, Green Building, Development, Interior Design

**Deliverables:**

* ConsultantType model with inspection stage templates
* InspectionStageTemplate model (JSONB for stage definitions)
* ProjectInspection model (actual inspections per project)
* InspectionResult model (completion records)
* Pydantic schemas
* CRUD APIs
